title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘We are the most privileged’: My husband and I are tired of paying for our friends. How do we get them to pay their way?
items.description: “My husband almost always ends up paying for everyone or picks up the entire bill.”

items.title: ‘We live modestly’: My wife and I have $900K in stocks and $380K in savings and CDs. Are we holding too much cash?
items.description: “My investment adviser says we have too much invested in cash instruments.”

items.title: My second wife says her 2 kids should inherit our estate, but I also have 2 kids. Is that fair?
items.description: “I will leave the $1 million inheritance I received from my parents to my biological daughters.”
